channel.title: Doom on J.M.A. Stough
channel.description: Recent content in Doom on J.M.A. Stough

item.title: Why Doom?
item.description: Take-home points Doom is a great introduction to video games Gameplay is simple and easy to learn The difficulty is can be adjusted to your abilities The first episode is free and publicly available There is a ton of fan-made content available for free online The software will run on just about anything OK, so why Doom? If you’ve heard of any PC video games in your life, there’s a good chance that they include The Sims, Minecraft, or Doom.
